title: The Drill: The 500-yard club
text:
The Drill: The 500-yard club Oct. 20, 2015 11:08 p.m. (0) Comments Norm Van Brocklin of the Los Angeles Rams 
San Diego Chargers quarterback Philip Rivers caused fits for the Green Bay Packers secondary Sunday, completing 43 of 65 passes for 503 yards. It was the 17th time a quarterback threw for 500 or more yards in NFL history. Here are the others: 
Norm Van Brocklin, Los Angeles Rams: 27 of 41 for 554 yards against the New York Yanks on Sept. 28, 1951. 
Warren Moon, Houston Oilers: 27 of 45 for 527 yards against the Kansas City Chiefs on Dec. 16, 1990. 
Matt Schaub, Houston Texans: 43 of 55 for 527 yards against the Jacksonville Jaguars on Nov. 18, 2012. 
Boomer Esiason, Arizona Cardinals: 35 of 59 for 522 yards against the Washington Redskins on Nov. 10, 1996. 
Ben Roethlisberger, Pittsburgh Steelers: 40 of 49 for 522 yards against the Indianapolis Colts on Oct. 26, 2014. 
Dan Marino, Miami Dolphins: 35 of 60 for 521 yards against the New York Jets on Oct. 23, 1988. 
Matthew Stafford, Detroit Lions: 36 of 59 for 520 yards against the Green Bay Packers on Jan. 1, 2012. 
Tom Brady, New England Patriots: 32 of 48 for 517 yards against the Miami Dolphins on Sept. 12, 2011. 
Phil Simms, New York Giants: 40 of 62 for 513 yards against the Cincinnati Bengals on Oct. 13, 1985. 
Drew Brees, New Orleans Saints: 37 of 52 for 510 yards against the Bengals on Nov. 18, 2006. 
Eli Manning, New York Giants: 31 of 51 for 510 yards against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers on Sept. 16, 2012. 
Vince Ferragamo, Los Angeles Rams: 30 of 46 for 509 yards against the Chicago Bears on Dec. 26, 1982. 
Tony Romo, Dallas Cowboys: 25 of 36 for 506 yards against the Denver Broncos on Oct. 6, 2013. 
Y.A. Tittle, New York Giants: 27 of 39 for 505 yards against the Redskins on Oct. 28, 1962. 
Elvis Grbac, Kansas City Chiefs: 39 of 53 for 504 yards against the Oakland Raiders on Nov. 5, 2000. 
Roethlisberger, Steelers: 29 of 46 yards for 503 yards against the Packers on Dec. 20, 2009. 
www.pro-football-reference.com
